import React, { useState } from 'react'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; function TripForm() { const [departure, setDeparture] = useState(''); const [destination, setDestination] = useState(''); const [date, setDate] = useState(''); const [time, setTime] = useState(''); const [carName, setCarName] = useState(''); const [cost, setCost] = useState(''); const [numSeats, setNumSeats] = useState('1'); const [luggage, setLuggage] = useState('none'); const [airConditioned, setAirConditioned] = useState(false); const [childSeat, setChildSeat] = useState(false); const [petFriendly, setPetFriendly] = useState(false); const [notes, setNotes] = useState(''); const handleCreateTrip = () => { // For now, just console.log or show an alert alert('Trip Created!\nDeparture: ' + departure + '\nDestination: ' + destination + '\nCar: ' + carName + '\nCost: ' + cost); window.location.href = '/home'; }; return (
